mapper.select:
SELECT su.id, su.name, su.phone, su.email, su.user_name userName, su.en_user_name enUserName, ( CASE su.`audit_status` WHEN '1' THEN '待审核' WHEN '2' THEN '审核通过' WHEN '0' THEN '审核拒绝' END ) auditStatusDesc, sr.`name` roleName, -- c.`company_name` companyName, su.`created_time` createdTime, DATE_FORMAT(su.`created_time`,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') strCreatedTime, su.`created_user` createdUser, (SELECT t.user_name FROM `system_user` t WHERE t.id = su.`superior_id`) superiorName, su.`work_name` workName, sr.`id` roleId, su.note, su.`audit_status` auditStatus -- le.`id` lid, -- le.`legal_name` legalName
FROM `system_user` su LEFT JOIN system_user_role_relation surr ON surr.`user_id` = su.`id` LEFT JOIN system_role sr ON sr.`id` = surr.`role_id` -- LEFT JOIN company c -- ON su.`company_id` = c.`id` -- LEFT JOIN system_user_legal sul -- ON su.`id` = sul.`system_user_id` -- LEFT JOIN legal_entity le -- ON le.`id` = sul.`legal_id` LEFT JOIN department dt ON dt.`id` = su.`department_id` WHERE su.user_type = '1'
and su.`status` = 1
and su.name like concat('%',#{form.name},'%')
and su.`audit_status` = '1'
and (select GROUP_CONCAT(sul.legal_id) from system_user_legal sul where sul.system_user_id = su.id group by su.id) like concat('%',#{form.companyId},'%')
and su.audit_status = #{form.auditStatus}
and su.user_name like concat('%',#{form.userName},'%')
and su.department_id in
#{item}
select le.`id` id,le.`legal_name` legalName from legal_entity le LEFT JOIN system_user_legal sul on le.`id` = sul.`legal_id` where sul.`system_user_id` = #{id}

SELECT su.id, su.user_name userName, su.en_user_name enUserName, su.phone, w.`work_name` workName, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM `system_user` t WHERE t.`department_id` = su.`department_id` AND t.`is_department_charge` = '0') countUser FROM `system_user` su LEFT JOIN `work` w ON su.`work_id` = w.`id` WHERE su.`department_id` = #{departmentId} AND su.`is_department_charge` = '1'
SELECT su.id, su.user_name userName FROM `system_user` su WHERE su.`role_id` = #{roleId}

SELECT su.id, su.`name`, su.user_name userName, su.`en_user_name` enUserName, su.`department_id` departmentId, d.`name` departmentName, su.`work_id` workId, su.`work_name` workName, sr.`id` roleId, sr.`name` roleName, (SELECT c.company_name FROM company c WHERE c.id = su.`company_id`) companyName, su.`company_id` companyId, su.`superior_id` superiorId, (SELECT t.user_name FROM `system_user` t WHERE t.id = su.`superior_id`) superiorName, su.`phone`, su.`email`, su.`is_department_charge` isDepartmentCharge FROM `system_user` su LEFT JOIN department d ON su.`department_id` = d.`id` LEFT JOIN system_user_role_relation surr ON su.`id` = surr.`user_id` LEFT JOIN system_role sr ON sr.`id` = surr.`role_id` WHERE su.`id` = #{id}
